<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Caterwaul](/Feats.aspx?ID=5564) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=541" />
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=590" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 11 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
An ally within 30 feet would be reduced to 0 HP but not immediately killed.

</column>

---

You give a daring yowl, calling your companion back from the brink of unconsciousness. Your ally isn't knocked out and remains at 1 Hit Point. Their [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=99) condition still increases by 1 as though they had been dying and recovered.
name: Caterwaul
